Sentencas: The catalytic activity of symmetrical LSM (La0.8Sr0.2MnO3) cells operated under single chamber solid oxide fuel cell (SC-SOFC) conditions was investigated for methane-to-oxygen ratios R-in between 1 and 2.
Titulo: Catalytic activity and performance of LSM cathode materials in single chamber SOFC

Sentencas: The oxidation reactions over electrodes sintered at 1100 degrees C (LSM1100) and 1200 degrees C (LSM1200) were studied, and the effect of any combustion was followed through electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS).
Titulo: Catalytic activity and performance of LSM cathode materials in single chamber SOFC

Sentencas: The activity of the LSM oo electrode increases with temperature.
Titulo: Catalytic activity and performance of LSM cathode materials in single chamber SOFC

Sentencas: Above 700 degrees C, the conversion of the oxygen species may exceed 30%.
Titulo: Catalytic activity and performance of LSM cathode materials in single chamber SOFC

Sentencas: As a consequence, oxygen depletion is occurring and a low frequency semicircle in the EIS spectra becomes predominant.
Titulo: Catalytic activity and performance of LSM cathode materials in single chamber SOFC

Sentencas: An increase of the sintering temperature to 1200 degrees C leads to a decrease in the catalytic activity.
Titulo: Catalytic activity and performance of LSM cathode materials in single chamber SOFC

Sentencas: A LSM1100 electrode deposited on a Julich half-cell proves to reach better performance at 600 degrees C than at 700 degrees C. On such complete cells, however, the catalytic combustion becomes much more complex than on a LSM cathode alone.
Titulo: Catalytic activity and performance of LSM cathode materials in single chamber SOFC

Sentencas: We are thus proposing a comprehensive parameter, R-out, that is summarizing the processes inside the single chamber reactor.
Titulo: Catalytic activity and performance of LSM cathode materials in single chamber SOFC
